All study participants were fully sequenced for GBA mutations and genotyped for the LRRK2 p.G2019S mutation as previously described.
12 Two SCARB2 SNPs were genotyped by TaqMan SNP genotyping assays, rs6812193 and rs6825004 (assay IDs: C__31139749_10 and C___1129894_20, respectively) following the manufacturer’s instructions, and the genotypes were called using QuantStudio™ 7 Flex Real-Time PCR System and Software (Applied Biosystems, Foster City, CA, USA).
